page.title: 04 Farms
page.content: {Farms } In our block there are eight farms:- White House,Burnhopeside Farm,More Leazers Farm,Peth House Farm,High Burnhopeside Farm,Biggen Farm,Green Well Farm,Manor House Farm.All of the farms are mixed farms and vary in size. Manor House farm is typical of farms in our block.It has 200 acres of land and wheat,barley and grass are grown. The farmer has about 80 cattle.He sells the cattle at Hexham mart.A cow costs about Â£400 and a calf costs about Â£100. The wheat and barley that is grown is sold to merchants such as Farmway West Cumberland Farmers.The farmer has many machines to help him.He has a hay bailer a Canadian Harvester,seed drill,a corn drill, a muck spreader and tractors.
